trans-unit.source: The previous example showed a standard sign-in, which requires the client to contact both the identity provider and the mobile service every time that the app starts.
trans-unit.target: The previous example showed a standard sign-in, which requires the client to contact both the identity provider and the mobile service every time that the app starts.

trans-unit.source: Not only is this method inefficient, you can run into usage-relates issues should many customers try to start you app at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Not only is this method inefficient, you can run into usage-relates issues should many customers try to start you app at the same time.

trans-unit.source: A better approach is to cache the authorization token returned by Mobile Services and try to use this first before using a provider-based sign-in.
trans-unit.target: A better approach is to cache the authorization token returned by Mobile Services and try to use this first before using a provider-based sign-in.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]You can cache the token issued by Mobile Services regardless of whether you are using client-managed or service-managed authentication.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]You can cache the token issued by Mobile Services regardless of whether you are using client-managed or service-managed authentication.

trans-unit.source: In this version of **AuthenticateAsync**, the app tries to use credentials stored encrypted in local storage to access the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: In this version of **AuthenticateAsync**, the app tries to use credentials stored encrypted in local storage to access the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: A simple query is sent to verify that the stored token is not expired.
trans-unit.target: A simple query is sent to verify that the stored token is not expired.

trans-unit.source: When a 401 is returned, a regular provider-based sign-in is attempted.
trans-unit.target: When a 401 is returned, a regular provider-based sign-in is attempted.

trans-unit.source: A regular sign-in is also performed when there is no stored credential.
trans-unit.target: A regular sign-in is also performed when there is no stored credential.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]This app tests for expired tokens during login, but token expiration can occur after authentication when the app is in use.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]This app tests for expired tokens during login, but token expiration can occur after authentication when the app is in use.
